about_the_game:
Get ready! Hentai Puzzle: Naughty Nurses invites you to a provocative and thrilling hospital world! Complete the puzzles to uncover daring and alluring scenes featuring seductive nurses, and lose yourself in an experience that will push your boundaries. This game ignites your imagination and keeps you coming back for more with every puzzle!

Each completed puzzle brings you closer to the captivating world of the nurses. Stunning artwork and detailed scenes amplify the game’s atmosphere, offering an unforgettable experience. Dive into the visuals and the surprises the game has to offer!

With its addictive gameplay and tantalizing theme, Hentai Puzzle: Naughty Nurses will take you to the heights of fun and desire. Gather your courage and embark on this unique journey!

content_descriptors.notes: Hentai Puzzle: Lustful Legends contains explicit sexual content and nudity. This game is intended for adult audiences only and is not suitable for minors.

short_description: Hentai Puzzle: Naughty Nurses is a hospital-themed puzzle game! Solve 50 different puzzles featuring attractive nurses and enjoy more passion at each level.
